documentation.brief: This filter implements a bump mapping effect on the geometry by modifying the point normals.
documentation.long: The BumpMap filter modifies the point normals so as to bump map the geometry, not only as a rendering effect.
This property specifies the input to the BumpMap filter. This is the dataset to which the bump map effect will be applied.

domain.text:
The dataset much contain a field array (point)
with 1 component(s).

The dataset much contain a field array (point)
with 3 component(s).

documentation.long: The value of this property will be used as a multiplier for scaling the perturbation of the normals.
